document_data.name: ''Crown of Darshee''
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite dragon annual/1997/The magic of Myth Drannor|94}}
document_data.mainbody: The '''''crown of Darshee''''' was one of the treasures in the [[Vault of Ages]].
document_data.Powers: The crown allowed its possessor to appear as they had while younger.
document_data.History: The ''crown of Darshee'' was in the [[Vault of Ages]] as of {{yearlink|241}}.{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor|131|6}}
